forum.content:
I used to join language cafe in Taipei to meet new friends and also share sth different and interesting. Some of them are from overseas, some of them are travellers, and some of them, just like me, r local people.

However, I moved to Taichung last year, and I still not sure where to meet new friends and if there are any regular meeting here.

Does anyone know any regular meeting like this, language cafe, English corner, or CSer regular meeting, please let me know. We could go together~~ LOL

many thanks, have a good night. :)
forum.title: Any language cafe or speaking study group in Taichung??
